snippet.title: Specialized Turbo electric-assisted bicycle
snippet.description: Would you give up driving for a sexy, electric bicycle? After riding Specialized's Turbo, one Car Tech editor is tempted.

snippet.title: Revolights inventor lights the way for safer cycling (video)
snippet.description: Kent Frankovich's design, which makes it easier for cyclists to see and be seen, is a spin on the good old-fashioned bike reflector.

snippet.title: Scalextric gets on its bike with London 2012 cycling edition
snippet.description: The 2012 London Olympics is getting its own Scalextric set, with a replica of the Olympic Velodrome among the Team GB tat coming out before the international sporting jamboree.

snippet.title: Energy Saver Processor Cycling bug; Sleeper solution
snippet.description: Energy Saver Processor Cycling bug; Sleeper solution

snippet.title: Cycling bib has built-in MP3 player
Illustrator 9 "Save" glitch?; Processor cycling and G4s; Sprockets 1.7.4 gone?; PPPoE in Mac OS X?
snippet.description: Illustrator 9 "Save" glitch?; Processor cycling and G4s; Sprockets 1.7.4 gone?; PPPoE in Mac OS X?

snippet.title: AT&T covers more than 270 million with 4G LTE
snippet.description: AT&T announced Monday that it is adding another two dozen markets to its 4G LTE service, which now means its service covers more than 270 million people.

snippet.title: Road Trip 2009 hits 4,000 miles in Glacier National Park
snippet.description: For the second straight thousand-mile milestone, Road Trip 2009 saw the odometer on the clean-diesel SUV hit zeroes at a world-class location.

snippet.title: Road Trip 2009: What time is it, anyway?
snippet.description: Why did two iPhones and a Garmin GPS device give me the time from a zone hundreds of miles away?

snippet.title: Road Trip 2009: Across the Rockies and Great Plains
snippet.description: For the fourth summer, CNET News' Daniel Terdiman will explore a region of the country, investigating its best destinations and road-testing the latest tech gear.
